description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com.leave blank auto using am mongodb.

AUTO_LEAVING_ASSISTANT.description: Set this to True if you want the assistant to automatically leave chats after an interval

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user whom you would like to add as OWNER.get owner id from @Sophia_x_MusicBot in telegram

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram v1 And v2 String Session from @Sessoin_String_gen_BOT.

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Add Your Channel link like - https://t.me/AMBOTYT

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Add Your Chat Group link like - https://t.me/AM_YTSUPPORT

ABOUT_ME.description: Add Your About Telegam CHannel Link

CHAT_LOGS.description: Add Your Chat Group id for new group add logs id like -100

OWNER_USERNAME.description: Enter Owner Username without @ like @AM_YTBOTT to use AM_YTBOTT

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Do not ever try to put channel ID here.
